          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic attraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetische Anziehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração magnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione magnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητική έλξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción magnética</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an electromagnetic attracting magnetic steel cans, leaving behind non-magnetic aluminium cans.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-magnetic materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die elektromagnetischen 
anziehenden magnetischen Stahldosen und verläßt hinter 
antimagnetischen Aluminiumdosen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les bidons en acier 
magnétiques d'attraction électromagnétiques, laissant les bidons 
non magnétiques d'aluminium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as latas de aço 
magnéticas de atração eletromagnéticas, saindo atrás das latas 
non-magnetic do alumínio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le latte d'acciaio 
magnetiche attraentesi elettromagnetiche, lascianti le latte non 
magnetiche dell'alluminio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δοχεία ενός 
ηλεκτρομαγνητικά προσέλκυσης μαγνητικά χάλυβα, φεύγοντας πίσω 
από τα non-magnetic δοχεία αλουμινίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las latas de acero 
magnéticas de atracción electromágneticas, yéndose detrás de las 
latas no magnéticas del aluminio.</string>
          </description>
